column4: maybe a noob question but: how do I remove the partitions from my ubuntu desktop? If I rightclick on  a partition (e.g.  hda7) I can't choose delete
hi. maybe a noob question but: how do I remove the partitions from my ubuntu desktop? If I rightclick on  a partition (e.g.  hda7) I can't choose delete
do you want to unmount them or delete them?
no i just don't want to see them
then _jason had a command for you
thanks jason and you Joh6nn and the others
